title: Reward Badges Missing
body:
I just noticed this... but on the old league forums before the boards were created I had been awarded an icon to show I was a "helpful" person on the boards and contributed a lot...

But I no longer have that...

Was that feature and reward removed?

replies.body: Can you be a bit more specific? Was this part of a volunteer program or something similar?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=J9lhuBzO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-30T15:11:44.350+0000)
>
> Can you be a bit more specific? Was this part of a volunteer program or something similar?

Not sure. I use to just come on the forums and post every day and help out nothing specific. Then one day I signed on to find a letter and I had been awarded a free random skin it was a heimer skin and I was given a badge on the forums to show I was a "helpful" person

I did actually notice this a while ago but I just kinda procrastinated ever bringing it up XD I'm a terrible procrastinator XD

Also I noticed my other recruiter badge was still there recently so I wondered why it was there but not my other badge. Its not a big deal but I was just wondering about it was all...

We did have an old wrenchmen program on NA that has since concluded. Additionally, the icons for these wrenchmen were on the old boards and did not migrate over  when we moved to the new boards we now use.

I hope this cleared it up for you. Please let me know if you have any further questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=J9lhuBzO,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-08-31T20:29:48.227+0000)
>
> We did have an old wrenchmen program on NA that has since concluded. Additionally, the icons for these wrenchmen were on the old boards and did not migrate over  when we moved to the new boards we now use.
> 
> I hope this cleared it up for you. Please let me know if you have any further questions.

Thank you yes that very much sounds like what I was given so that does make sense. Thank you for letting me know what happened as I was curious about it. Anyways I'll continue to keep posting bug reports and suggestions either way ^.^ however most "help/support" questions tend to be beyond me these days... it amazes me how much things have changed over just a few years lol.
Why'd you get a reward for that? Sounds like some troll stuff to me.

> [{quoted}](name=Ihatethisgame111,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=J9lhuBzO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-29T16:28:32.760+0000)
>
> Why'd you get a reward for that? Sounds like some troll stuff to me.

Because on the previous forum 2 of my champion ideas were used. The current ranking system was a created in a very very very large post by me and put up as a forum discussion with many many points. I also helped A LOT of people with technical support stuff when the stuff was a lot easier to answer ^.^ and I've been active on the forums reporting bugs what not since season 1 =\
